data.description:
A sport with 2.5 billion fans across the world is now in VR as iB Cricket (vSport). Step into immersive world-class stadiums with thousands cheering for you and hit the ball out of the park. Our realistic physics makes it intuitive to learn the sport within 10 mins. 

Till date, over 500+ million balls have been played by people from 40+ countries, including both cricketing & non-cricketing nations. 98% of them said that iB Cricket is amazing! iB Cricket has also received appreciation from 100+ world-class Cricketers.
- Numerous Bowling Options: Right arm, left arm; Fast, medium pace, off spin, leg spin & more.
- Intelligent fielding based on built-in AI
- Multiple Stadiums
- PvP:  Bowl to your friends & challenge them in a one-on-one match. 
- Leagues & Tournaments
- Multiple Cricket Formats: 20, 50, unlimited overs 
- Coaching Module 
- VR Bowling
- Campaign Mode
- CO-OP
- Practice Nets
- Fun MR Mode Games.

Hone your skills, compete in global tournaments & become a vSport star.

changelog.change_log:
1) Smoother Game play
2) Better Stadium Quality
3) Better overall performance
4) PVP Left hand batsman field set issue is corrected
5) Continuation match Slow bowling is also corrected
6) Bowling Action are made smooth. Will be made much better soon.
Crashes and inverted image issue is resolved.

Note: Since we had to rebuild the entire game the update is greater than 4 GB

Minor Update Changes:

1. Changed algorithm for ball movement especially in seam and swing
2. Movement will be based on newness of the ball. movement will vary and reduce gradually as the ball becomes older
3. Insane mode will get the same stock ball but reduced movement mechanics as Ultra Insane
4. New Pro 360 degree tournaments
5. In campaign mode we made it easier to score 2’s

Minor Update Changes:

1. Changed algorithm for ball movement especially in seam and swing
2. Movement will be based on newness of the ball. movement will vary and reduce gradually as the ball becomes older
3. Insane mode will get the same stock ball but reduced movement mechanics as Ultra Insane
4. New Pro 360 degree tournaments
5. In campaign mode we made it easier to score 2’s

New Update with many Tactical Changes is live now

1. New Difficulty Mode Ultra Insane is Awesome and its not for the faint hearted
      a. Fast Bowlers can now ball in excess of 150, Watch out for bouncers.
      b. Bowlers will have stock deliveries
    c. Bowlers will bowl in spells
    d. New Aggressive Fielding templates and bowling according to them
    e. Special Deliveries based on the newness of the ball and pitch conditions
        i. Green Pitch - Swing and Seam bowlers
        ii. Hard Pitch - Seam and Cutters
    f. Variable pace of the pitch, variable ball movement 
2. Auto Save Option for tournament knockout matches and quick start is available.
3. Fielding Algo new changes
    a. Fielders no longer catch the ball without looking at it (Back catches).
    b. Runs timing have been fine tuned
    c. Over running the ball is corrected
    d. New Fielding templates have been added
4. Special Ball Changes
    a. Removed Banana Balls from stock deliveries
    b. Added 2 new special balls seam in and seam out 
    c. Decreased Cutters pace
5. Ball trace option now shows difference between special ball and normal ball for stock deliveries
6. New Pro tournaments with Ultra Insane difficulty for those who crossed 1000 super runs
7. Improved bowling and fielding AI for Scooping: Does what a human can do if a batsman is only scooping, Once the AI decided a batsman is scooping.
    a. Bowlers will have no restriction on cutters they can bowl at any speed of the delivery
    b. More field sets to stop excessive scooping
8. Auto Matchmaking for PVP is released in Beta for users with more than 1000 super runs. Please let us know your feedback.
9. VR bowling no ball corrections made in PVP
10. Scores display in Quick start has been made consistent
11. Visuals of Stadium 6 have been improved

A minor update but very impactful one

* 5.0 feet min height for Adults is assumed and bowling is accordingly decided
    - Hard for scoopers in all modes they have to play normal shots
    - Lets see what they come up with

* For Kids there is a new mode with different leaderboards
    - Setting → Game Setting → Kids Mode

* Bat ball Patch corrections have been made
* Bat back side hits are corrected
* New 2 month Seasonal 360 Degree Tournaments starting today for both CO-OP and single player
* Quick Start Leader Boards stats are reset.
* Custom Tournament 
    - Increased the max limit 3 to 10 Tournaments
    - By Default Pitch Marker is off.

Major Updates:
- Update in Ball physics has been made to make more closer real life.
- Introducing iB TV Beta  - Where you can watch the Match Replay / Highlights / Fall Of Wickets of completed tournament matches.
    - Setup Guide : https://profile.ib.cricket/ibtv
    - Please note that this is a Companion app in Steam Store App(Basic Windows Computer required). Field mismatch is the known issue.
    - Upcoming Features in iB TV
        - We are planning to bring the same feature to VR soon.
        - Quick Start and PVP matches will also be soon available to spectating purpose.

Enhancements:
- Web Profile App got an Inbox feature for addressing reported issues - https://profile.ib.cricket/notifications
- Helmet View
    - Can be turned ON through Settings -> Game Settings
- Practice - Bowling machine Indication to start the delivery
- LIV latest package integration for Quest
    - On Quest, Watch Mode Feature (Beta) - You can get a third-person view (or) broadcasting view of your gameplay in live now on a PC / Laptop
    - Setup Guide : https://help.liv.tv/hc/en-us/articles/4405031021330-Watch-Mode-Beta-QoPC-
    - Can be turned ON through Settings -> Camera Settings
- Minor Security upgrade

Bug Fixes:
- Handled the rare issue of game getting stuck When AUTOMATIC delivery type is set for next ball and user clicking on next ball button at the same time. This was causing game being stuck to some players.
